message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth at least that much to you. Let me know your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $13,000 on it. Would you consider lowering the price? I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for it.
